replies.commentBody:
"Is there no end to whatever means necessary Democrats will go to shift the attention away from the positive response of President's Trump address to Congress last night?"

I seem to remember that during the previous administration having the audacity to read a speech from a Teleprompter was a capital offense.

comments.commentBody:
Really. Is there no end to whatever means necessary Democrats will go to shift the attention away from the positive response of President's Trump address to Congress last night?

Whatever the outcome, Hillary Clinton still will not be President of the United States.

Perhaps the Democrats and the far left should be careful what they seek because someone more radical could become POTUS.

replies.commentBody:
The Constitutional definition of treason:
"Treason against the United States, shall consist only in levying War against them, or in adhering to their Enemies, giving them Aid and Comfort. No Person shall be convicted of Treason unless on the Testimony of two Witnesses to the same overt Act, or on Confession in open Court."
Note that the only mention of war is as a defined treasonous act against the United States. The reason that so few persons are charged with treason is the requirement for "the Testimony of two Witnesses to the same overt Act." In the absence of two witnesses, a charge of treason cannot be sustained.

comments.commentBody: I believe many of the erudite commenters do not know the definition of treason according to American law. Treason can only occur if the United States is in a declared war. Although we appear to be involved in perpetual warfare, war has not been declared by an act of Congress. And, this is a Congress that fails to fulfill its Constitutional duties quite often these days despite holding up the document like they own it. They're very big on the 2nd and 10th Amendments, and that's about it, although they like the 1st Amendment since a woefully corrupt SCOTUS declared that money equals speech; obviously, this is incorrect since it violates equal protection under the law. We have not had a declared war since WWII. That's why all of the spies who have been caught are indicted and tried under the Espionage Act. So, there are likely acts of espionage, but one can't use the word treason, as it does not apply.

Treason: helping and aiding a foreign government. An illegitimate president elected in illegitimate elections. Simply flip the scenario that the democrats would have had these contacts with Russia: the Republicans would have created mayhem. The most ethical president followed by the most unethical scoundrel.

"Mr. Trump has denied that his campaign had any contact with Russian officials."

Because Trump is known to be a serial liar (his statements have averaged about 70% outright lies), a denial like the above should be considered as the nearest thing to an admission of his guilt.

Congress and the American people should stop, take a breath and think what this all really means, it deserves the serious attention that any threat to our Country has ever deserved. How will we be confident in any future elections until the questions raised by this issue as they relate to our last election are completely investigated?

This could be the beginning of a new Penatgon Papers or Watergate. Not that either of those are to be relished.  But what the US does need to resolve quickly is did Putin and Trump steal this election.  That would be the ultimate reason for their bromance.  I have found it curious that while Ambassador Haley has often taken Russia to task at the UN, the president has never publicly supported her.

replies.commentBody: What isn't a rumor but obvious fact is that the Trump Administration is feverishly trying to poison the well so Americans will lose faith in both news reporting and the intelligence community. They want to kill the very concept of truth.

comments.commentBody:
The rumors in Washington since about July or August last year have been that the Obama administration have laid traps and government time-bombs to ensnare Trump, to hobble his rise to power and (depending on how many traps he falls into) setting the stage for impeachment by 2018.

Part of the rumors have been validated in this article, which, in my view, makes the rest of the gossip that much more credible. We are living in interesting times.

replies.commentBody: Is there anyone with such access who is not beholden to the Trump Administration? I'm afraid there isn't.

comments.commentBody: Today's intelligence services, under the authority of trump, and today's Republican Congress, won't deliver the truth. The truth must come from others not beholden to the trump administration. Considering the strength of the trump resistance, I have some faith that it will.

This seems like a historic point of American history. Would checks and balances of the government work as the Founding Fathers intened.
It always starts small: some journalists get punished because they write unfavorable articles, intelligent agencies start working for political agenda, or some political party buries secrete of their leader because it is the easiest way to keep the power in their side.
I know this because I am a naturalized citizen originally from South Korea. If you want to fast forward this process and see the result of the wrong turn, see President Park.
Who will protect the integrity of erican election? Who can be trusted? This is starting to sound like a bad spy movie.

replies.commentBody:
Glad you're in support of investigating the election. I'm comfortable with the Obama administration being investigated, because I don't believe there was any foul play on their part.

What do you make of those who are opposed to looking into the election at all, and just taking it at face value?
Two wrongs don't make a right.  Clinton's actions or any others don't make the influence of Russia okay.

comments.commentBody: One way to put this political matter to rest is for the FBI and the CIA to reveal how many other countries had possibly suspicious election contacts with Clinton campaign officials, whether through the Clinton foundations or by hacking into Republican National Committe websites. For all we know the Obama administration may have been engaged in dirty tricks to assist the Clinton campaign.  Are we to believe that only the Russian government, and none others, may have tried  to influence our last Presidential election? Not on your life.

Trump, his administration, his campaign staff and business partners are all on high alert. There is no way they will cooperate in any way with any investigation.
And the GOP will do anything they can to crush any investigation into the afore mentioned group. After all, Trump is their golden ticket.
While the FBI is 'looking into' the matter of Russian hacking doubts about Director Comey and his pre-existing condition of allegiance to the GOP raise doubts about how far he will go or chose not to go in his investigation.
So the efforts of members of the Obama administration to ensure a measure of transparency in future investigations is welcome. Someone needs to go against Trump, Bannon and Priebus. The gang of three will go to any lengths to stop information coming into the light.
Who do the intelligence communities tell when the boss is colluding with the enemy?

After growing up as a duck and cover child in my school years and living through the hatreds and angers of the world in my formative years, I did not follow the pack of enraged people. I fell back on my religious lessons of peace and friendship and most important, forgiveness.

I was a creation of the cold war that followed after WWII when America and Russia, arm in arm defeated a nightmare that will forever harm the minds of billions for many generations. I remember Dad preparing the basement as a fallout and blast shelter during the Cuban Missile Crisis. The World could have been destroyed in mere hours and I lived with that knowledge for decades.

How absurd hatred and anger is. Kings, Queens, Presidents and Prime Ministers routinely create external enemies to focus hatred and anger outward to avoid internal threatening conflict inherent in all civilizations for the history of mankind.

I was so relieved when the Cold War was finally settled by Reagan and Gorbachev and was very grateful to both. We enjoyed a new age of peace and greater world security for several decades.

Then along came the KGB spymaster Putin that upset the peace. It was inevitable that an old spy would want to spy. I think the Russian interference in our election is soundly demonstrated and I consider Obama's spreading the evidence to save it a really brave and honorable act to save America.

I expect one day Trump will be revealed as a Russian puppet. I always wanted world peace, not a Russian Leader.
Where are his tax returns, and which GOP members of the House shut down a resolution requiring disclosure? They are complicit in preventing a full investigation in the name of our democracy.
Too little too late I'm afraid. Why are we still not hearing specific information, instead of just innuendo?

The truth is hard to hear. The truth is necessary. The truth is more important now than ever.

The truth points to Trump and his administration being involved in a way that undermines America - its citizens and its values.

If our Congressmen and House Representatives don't take the lead on investigating this, then the people will need to. Join a local resistance group - there are thousands across the country already. The integrity of our democracy and our country is at stake.

This is our America - for this, we will fight. United we stand.

If President Obama had information that was critically important to be made public, then that was what was necessary at the time.  I however find this "secret" attempt to undo another administration problematic.  The responsibility was with Obama to be entirely open about what came to light when Obama was still president.

replies.commentBody: Where's the beef?  This "news" is speculative nothing more.

comments.commentBody: Evidence for the eventual impeachment if Trump continues to accumulate.

This is a warning from the leakers to the various people investigating, particularly those that would stone wall, i.e. Republicans. Leakers are saying: "There is a lot of info out there. We've seen it. We have it, so be careful."

Also notable: the mention of American allies- Britain and Netherlands. Their intelligence agencies are always listening to Russia as well, and sharing with the U.S. This is bad news for anyone in Trump's orbit who is guilty. Or Trump himself.
Don't stop. Keep digging.

This cannot stand.  Our nation's integrity depends on our autonomy.  It is clear that Vladimir Putin manipulated his wish for Trump to hold office.  Trump is his puppet when he should be our leader.  Every member of Congress and every intelligence agent must work together to keep the Presidency out of Putin's strings.

replies.commentBody:
Did you think this way over the YEARS of Hilary's unsafe computer use?

Or did it just become important because Trump won?
Jeff, I believe your story is describing OBAMA.

Question is - what are they leaking?
Lies and falsehoods?
Shadow government trying to give credibility to yet more slanderous and untrue accusations against President Trump?

comments.commentBody:
I'm losing patience with all narratives that focus on the "leaks." Anyone with any tiny amount of concern about our country's future should read this article and thank heaven that Obama took any action at all to shed some light on this situation. For most sane people, that's called patriotism and love of country, and some serious concern for the negative direction we're heading with Trump as POTUS.

The "leaks" that we all should be concerned about right now are the leaks that the Trump White House is likely providing to Russian intelligence. Everything else is political nonsense -- which is a much milder word than I had in mind.

As our corrupt leaders pull us closer and closer to fascism and authoritarianism, it's well past the time for all of us to wake up.

The smell of gun smoke is getting acrid and close. If this is true...and it appears to be true...the Trump Presidency will not survive its first term, perhaps not even its first year.

And I'd love to see those tax returns. They won't tell the whole story (or stories!) themselves, but they will certainly tell a great deal.
I'm confused. Is this all factual information? The political leaders say there is no evidence at all.
